subtitleNullable: Posture and Pose Estimation ( Yoga Asanas)
descriptionNullable:
Build a machine learning model which is able **classify the yoga Asanas** being performed in the image 
The developed model should perform well on both train and test dataset with high accuracies. 
Focus on the taking a look at the **features of the yoga pose images, pre-processing the images** for better training, building various **deep learning models** for pose classification and comparing results among different models.

 The dataset folder comprises **9 folders, 1** for each yoga pose. Each pose has almost **250+ images** extracted from Google.
title: Yoga Pose Classification Dataset
subtitle: Posture and Pose Estimation ( Yoga Asanas)
description:
Build a machine learning model which is able **classify the yoga Asanas** being performed in the image 
The developed model should perform well on both train and test dataset with high accuracies. 
Focus on the taking a look at the **features of the yoga pose images, pre-processing the images** for better training, building various **deep learning models** for pose classification and comparing results among different models.

 The dataset folder comprises **9 folders, 1** for each yoga pose. Each pose has almost **250+ images** extracted from Google.
